sqlMap.insert:
insert into sc_contract(isourceregedit,isource,icorp,ccode,cname,ddate,dbegin,dend,iproperty,irdtype,icustomer,icustperson,ccusttel,ccustfax,ccustpost,ccustaddress,ireceivecust,ireceivelkps,creceivetel,creceivefax,creceivepost,creceiveaddress,ddelivery,cpayment,itransport,iperson,idepartment,cdetail,fsum,frdsum,fspsum,frpsum,issignatory,icsignatory,csignatoryaddress,cmemo,istatus,cdefine1,cdefine2,cdefine3,cdefine4,cdefine5,fdefine1,fdefine2,fdefine3,fdefine4,fdefine5,ddefine1,ddefine2,ddefine3,ddefine4,ddefine5,bdefine1,bdefine2,imaker,dmaker,imodify,dmodify,iverify,dverify,iclose,dclose) values (#isourceregedit#,#isource#,#icorp#,#ccode#,#cname#,#ddate#,#dbegin#,#dend#,#iproperty#,#irdtype#,#icustomer#,#icustperson#,#ccusttel#,#ccustfax#,#ccustpost#,#ccustaddress#,#ireceivecust#,#ireceivelkps#,#creceivetel#,#creceivefax#,#creceivepost#,#creceiveaddress#,#ddelivery#,#cpayment#,#itransport#,#iperson#,#idepartment#,#cdetail#,#fsum#,#frdsum#,#fspsum#,#frpsum#,#issignatory#,#icsignatory#,#csignatoryaddress#,#cmemo#,#istatus#,#cdefine1#,#cdefine2#,#cdefine3#,#cdefine4#,#cdefine5#,#fdefine1#,#fdefine2#,#fdefine3#,#fdefine4#,#fdefine5#,#ddefine1#,#ddefine2#,#ddefine3#,#ddefine4#,#ddefine5#,#bdefine1#,#bdefine2#,#imaker#,#dmaker#,#imodify#,#dmodify#,#iverify#,#dverify#,#iclose#,#dclose#)
select @@identity as iid
sqlMap.select: select isnull(ltrim(cmnemonic),'') as cmnemonic from cs_customer where iid=#iid#
select isnull(ltrim(coutkey),'') from hr_person where iid=#iid#
select isnull(ltrim(coutkey),'') from aa_data where iclass=17 where iid=#iid#
select isnull(ltrim(coutkey),'') from aa_data where iclass=10 where iid=#iid#
select isnull(ltrim(coutkey),'') from aa_data where iclass=42 where iid=#iid#
